TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed XmlSerializationFixupCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub XmlSerializationFixupCallback(fixup As Object)
type XmlSerializationFixupCallback = delegate of obj -> unit

param.name: fixup
param.span: 類別的執行個體，其中包含要修復的物件以及要填入之項目的字串識別碼陣列。

span.span: An instance of the class that contains the object to be fixed and the array of string identifiers for the items to fill in.

summary.span: 針對 SOAP 編碼之 XML 資料類型的還原序列化， 類別所使用的委派。

span.span: Delegate used by the class for deserialization of SOAP-encoded XML data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 XML 文件還原序列化為.NET Framework 物件時，.NET Framework XML 序列化基礎結構動態具現化可實作的修正方法委派。While deserializing XML documents into .NET Framework objects, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically instantiates fix-up methods that implement the delegate. 基礎結構並因此其資料類型對應至.NET Framework 的 SOAP 編碼的陣列的參考型別。The infrastructure does so for SOAP-encoded arrays whose data types map to .NET Framework reference types. 然後，如有必要，修復方法稱為填入陣列中的物件。Then, as necessary, a fix-up method is called to fill in the objects in the array. 此外，在初始化期間，.NET Framework XML 序列化基礎結構以動態方式產生並編譯暫時類別還原序列化衍生自類別。In addition, during initialization, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically generates and compiles a temporary class for deserialization derived from the class. 在此過程中，基礎結構會產生SOAP 編碼、 多重參考 XML 資料的方法。During this process, the infrastructure generates methods for SOAP-encoded, multi-referenced XML data. 方法接著會在還原序列化期間叫用。The methods are then invoked during deserialization. 請勿直接建立的執行個體類別。Do not directly create an instance of the class. SOAP 編碼為 SOAP 1.1 規格的第 5 節中所述。SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
